data.title: FLAWLESS & FULL COVERAGE | BareMinerals Foundation Routine + Tips
data.description:
♥ PLEASE EXPAND MORE INFO!! ♥
NEVER MISS A BEAUTY VIDEO - Subscribe it's FREE :) 
--------WATCH IN HD-----------
For my Beauty BLOG -http://alwayscosmeticjunkie.blogspot.com/
Tweet Me | Follow me on TWITTER -http://twitter.com/erica4beauty
Official Facebook Page -https://www.facebook.com/erica4beauty
Facebook “Fan” Page -https://www.facebook.com/Alwayscosmeticjunkies
For daily Makeup Looks & Life randomness INSTAGRAM - http://instagram.com/alwayscosmeticjunkie
Google + https://plus.google.com/103980420766864376674/posts
My Tumbrl - http://alwayscosmeticjunkie.tumblr.com/
VLOG CHANNEL | EricaTVlog - https://www.youtube.com/user/EricaTVlog

Hello Everyone,  
Today’s video is showing how I get my flawless full coverage *Updated* foundation routine using mainly BareMinerals Makeup for 90% of the “full face”. I've been having multiple skin issues like skin texture and acne coming back! Oh No :( 
So I've resulted to using BareMinerals to get my skin covered up instead of my NARS Sheer Glow or Hourglass Foundations. And to be honest I'm loving this look, it's way more natural looking and doesn't feel caky or heavy on the skin, these minerals are gems!

PRODUCTS MENTIONED:
The Body Shop Tea Tree BB Cream (in shade 01)
BareMinerals Original & Matte Powder Foundation Both in the shade - Fair (TIP: Great shade match if your MAC NW15 OR NC15)
BareMinerals Prime Time Primer
BareMinerals Concealer in Well Rested 
BareMinerals Mineral Veil (Setting Powder)
MAC Cosmetics Mineralize Concealer in NC20
MAC Cosmetics Prep+Prime Brightener in Radient Rose
Makeup Geek Face Buffer Brush
Real Techniques Contour Brush and Setting Brush

EXTRA’S
TOP: From Jay Jays (Cheater to Tiger Printed Tee)
EARRINGS: Was a Gift (Inspiration Pendent) 
NECKLACE: Wearing None
NAILS: Maybelline SuperStay Gel Nail Polish in 130 Rose

VIDEO PROMISED:
REVIEW: TEA TREE BB CREAM - THE BODY SHOP 2014 
www.youtube.com/watch?v=tfkhfjSw4zA

OTHER VIDEOS YOU MIGHT LIKE?
UTOPIA GLOW | Galm Makeup Tutorial for Hooded Eyes
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ePcVKtMpYhQ

POISON HEART | GOTHIC Dark Makeup Tutorial
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ojCIi8uJhs

What's in My Makeup Backup Box?! 2014
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DgJEmMnkxsU 

#instahaul HOT OR NOT Drugstore Makeup | Part 3
www.youtube.com/watch?v=VT30LxRXUkA

BEST OF MAC MAKEUP: FACE, EYES & LIPS 101
 www.youtube.com/watch?v=MytQrovF6r4 

RIMMEL STAY MATTE Primer, Liquid Mousse Foundation & Powder Review 2014
www.youtube.com/watch?v=yF0JHIp_AFs

FULLER & THICKER LASHES | False Lash Mascara Look
www.youtube.com/watch?v=V88yJxWqd2g

Thank you for Watching,
Hugs Erica
Xx
Alwayscosmeticjunkie

THIS WAS NOT A SPONSORED VIDEO!!

data.title: Pink Glow for Cheeks & Lips | Makeup Tutorial | Clinique
data.description:
http://clnq.co/2eUC7ad

Bring your face to life with a rosy pink hue in your cheeks and lips. Clinique Colour Pro Damian Garozzo shows you how to make your face glow with allergy tested and 100% fragrance-free lip color and cheek blush colors.

In just a few minutes, add a pop of colour into your lips and cheeks. Begin by softening your lip line with the Clinique Airbrush Concealer. Color in your lips with your favorite rosy shade of Clinique Chubby Stick Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm. This lip tint not only gives your lips a shiny shade of color, but also nourishes and moisturizes your lips. Complete your glowing look by bringing out the apples of your cheeks with Clinique Cheek Pop. 

Click the link above to make your face glow with Clinique Cheek Pop.

Shop the products:
Chubby Stick Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm: http://clnq.co/2e10iVE

Airbrush Concealer: http://clnq.co/2eKlb8A

Cheek Pop: http://clnq.co/2eUC7ad

data.title: Instant Artistry: Blush with Depth and Dimension
data.description: Makeup skills in minutes. Learn to create depth and shine in all the right places for a dimensional lift to the face with Senior Artist Keri Blair's swift steps.

data.title: How to Blend Foundation Properly | Lancôme
data.description:
http://www.lancome.com Learn how to properly blend foundation using Lancôme's Foundation Brush #2.

Founded in 1935 by the visionary pioneer Armand Petitjean, Lancome immediately performed in selling perfume, beauty care and make-up to an international clientele. Today, The luxury cosmetics house is present in 130 countries, with 20,000 beauty advisers in as many points of sale relaying a message of French excellence. Lancome affirms that happiness is the most attractive beauty and offers every woman the possibility to enhance her beauty and femininity, whatever her age and whatever her skin color, by giving her the best of science with major innovations. Day after day, Lancome's ambition is that every woman who comes to Lancome to be more beautiful leaves happier.
